hero.title: Where Learning
hero.subtitle: Transform exam preparation into an engaging journey. From Darjah 1 to Tingkatan 5, track progress and celebrate achievements together.

features.title: Why Choose Edventure+?
features.subtitle: The Future of
features.description: We've reimagined exam preparation to make it engaging, effective, and enjoyable for both parents and children.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple Steps to
howItWorks.description: Transform your child's exam preparation in just three easy steps

subjects.title: Complete Coverage
subjects.subtitle: All Core Subjects
subjects.description: From Darjah 1 to Tingkatan 5, we've got all core subjects covered with thousands of questions

featureCards.gamifiedDescription: Earn XP points, unlock achievement badges, and celebrate milestones. Learning becomes an adventure, not a chore.
featureCards.questionBankDescription: Access thousands of past year questions across BM, BI, Mathematics, Science, and History for all levels.
featureCards.adaptiveDescription: Choose from Easy (10 MCQs), Medium (20-30 mixed), or Full Mode (complete papers) based on your child's readiness.
featureCards.trackingDescription: Monitor your children's learning journey with detailed analytics, performance reports, and improvement insights.
featureCards.familyDescription: Manage multiple children from one parent account. See everyone's progress at a glance and celebrate together.
featureCards.achievementDescription: Unlock badges for milestones like "First Perfect Score", "5-Day Streak", and "Subject Master" to keep motivation high.

steps.step1Description: Sign up as a parent and add your children's profiles with their school level and subjects. Set up takes less than 2 minutes.
steps.step2Description: Select subject and difficulty level. Our smart system generates randomized questions from past year papers tailored to your child's level.
steps.step3Description: Complete exercises, earn XP, unlock badges, and track improvement over time with detailed reports and analytics.

footnote.desktopSubtitle: Optimized for bigger screens & better learning
footnote.tagline: For now, grab your laptop and let's make learning magical together!

cta.title: Start Your Family's
cta.description: Join thousands of Malaysian families who are making exam preparation fun and effective with Edventure+.
cta.note: No credit card required • Set up in 2 minutes • Premium access included

auth.welcomeSubtitle: Transform exam practice into an engaging learning adventure for Malaysian students.

auth.trackProgressDescription: Watch your skills grow and celebrate every achievement!
auth.familyDashboardDescription: Parents and kids learning together as a team!
